name: guileful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
using cleverness in order to deceive someone or get what you want: We could see that John's guileful smile and flattering talk were a disguise, and that he was really looking for a way to take advantage of the situation. I don't think she is all that guileful; she'll be straightforward with you about her plans. Related word
guile
More examplesFewer examplesA guileful negotiator, he was able to talk the seller down from his asking price. Some people conduct themselves in strategic, guileful ways, looking out for their own best interests.
